translation.it: HOKEY POKEY DI PADRE E FIGLIA

translation.en: [Ms. Appleberry] Ready to do the Hokey Pokey, everybody?
translation.it: Siete tutti pronti a ballare l'hokey pokey?

translation.en: [all] ♪ You put your one foot in You put your one foot out ♪
translation.it: Tu prima porti avanti E indietro il piedino

translation.en: ♪ You put your one foot in And you shake it all about ♪
translation.it: E poi di nuovo avanti E lo scuoti un pochino

translation.en: ♪ You do the Hokey Pokey And you turn yourself around ♪
translation.it: Balliamo l'hokey pokey Ora fai un bel giretto

translation.en: [Ms. Appleberry] ♪ You put your other foot in ♪ ♪ You put your other foot out ♪
translation.it: Avanti l'altro piedino Indietro l'altro piedino

translation.en: ♪ You put your other foot in And you shake it all about ♪
translation.it: E poi di nuovo avanti E lo scuoti un pochino

translation.en: [all] ♪ You do the Hokey Pokey And you turn yourself around ♪
translation.it: Balliamo l'hokey pokey Ora fai un bel giretto

translation.en: [Ms. Appleberry] ♪ You put your one hand in ♪ ♪ You put your one hand out ♪
translation.it: Avanti la manina, indietro la manina

translation.en: ♪ You put your one hand in And you shake it all about ♪
translation.it: Poi di nuovo avanti E le dai una scossettina

translation.en: [all] ♪ You do the Hokey Pokey And you turn yourself around ♪
translation.it: Balliamo l'hokey pokey Ora fai un bel giretto

translation.en: ♪ You put your other hand in And you shake it all about ♪

translation.en: ♪ You do the Hokey Pokey And you turn yourself around ♪

translation.en: [all] ♪ You do the Hokey Pokey And you turn yourself around ♪
translation.it: Balliamo l'hokey pokey Ora fai un bel giretto

translation.en: ♪ You do the Hokey Pokey And you turn yourself around ♪
translation.it: Balliamo l'hokey pokey Ora fai un bel giretto

translation.en: And that's what it's all about!
[gasps] Want to have lunch in town instead?
translation.it: Ti va, invece, di pranzare in città?

translation.en: We can name all the sounds as we go.
translation.it: E indovineremo i suoni, per strada.

translation.en: [Mom] ♪ And on our way, we hear a… ♪
♪ With a tweet tweet here And a tweet tweet there ♪
translation.it: Con un cip cip qui ed un cip cip là

translation.en: ♪ Here a tweet, there a tweet A baby bird! Tweet, tweet! ♪
translation.it: Qui un cip, là un cip, che bell'uccellino!

translation.en: [JJ] ♪ And on our way we hear a… ♪
♪ With a ring ring here And a ring ring there ♪
translation.it: Con un ring ring qui ed un ring ring là

translation.en: ♪ Here a ring, there a ring It's a bell! Ring! Ring! ♪
translation.it: Qui un ring, là un ring Che bel campanello!

translation.en: ♪ And on our way we hear a… ♪
♪ With a honk honk here And a honk honk there ♪
translation.it: Con un bip bip qui ed un bip bip là

translation.en: ♪ Here a honk, there a honk It's a bus! Honk honk! ♪
translation.it: Qui un bip, là un bip Senti che bel clacson!

translation.en: ♪ And on our way we hear a… ♪
[Mom] ♪ With a meow meow here And a meow meow there ♪
translation.it: Con un miao miao qui ed un miao miao là

translation.en: ♪ Here a meow, there a meow It's a cat! Meow, meow! ♪
translation.it: Miao di qua, miao di là Ma che bel gattino!

translation.en: ♪ And on our way we heard a… ♪
[JJ] ♪ With a chime chime here And a chime chime there ♪
translation.it: Con un dlin dlin qui ed un dlin dlin là

translation.en: ♪ Here a chime, there a chime Everywhere a chime chime ♪
translation.it: Dlin di qua, dlin di là, è una campanella!

translation.en: [both] ♪ Me and Mommy went to town ♪
[Cece and Bella] ♪ Red and yellow And violet and green ♪
translation.it: Rosso e giallo e viola e verde

translation.en: ♪ Sing a rainbow, sing a rainbow too ♪
translation.it: Io lo canto, cantalo anche tu

translation.en: [both] ♪ Red and yellow And violet and green ♪
translation.it: Rosso e giallo e viola e verde

translation.en: [Cece and Bella] ♪ Red and yellow And violet and green ♪
translation.it: Rosso e giallo e viola e verde

translation.en: ♪ Now we can sing a rainbow ♪

translation.it: Guardate! Anche noi siamo un arcobaleno.

translation.en: [JJ] ♪ I like to eat, eat, eat Apples and bananas ♪
translation.it: Amo mangiare la mela e la banana

translation.en: [JJ and YoYo] ♪ I like to eat, eat, eat Apples and bananas ♪
translation.it: Amo mangiare la mela e la banana

translation.en: [JJ] ♪ I like to eat, eat, eat Apples and bananas ♪
translation.it: Amo mangiare la mela e la banana

translation.en: [all] ♪ We like to eat, eat, eat Apples and bananas ♪
translation.it: Amo mangiare la mela e la banana

translation.en: Let's try singing with vowel sounds.
♪ I like to eat, eat, eat Ay-ples and ba-nay-nays ♪
translation.it: Ama mangiara la mala e la banana

translation.it: Ame mengere le mele e le benene

translation.it: Ami mingiri li mili e li binini

Che ne dite di provare la "U"?

Tutti i bimbi accanto alla maestra

translation.en: ♪ Gather around For the Animal Name game ♪
translation.it: Per il gioco dei nomi degli animali

translation.en: [all] ♪ "B" like a bumblebee Buzzing like a bumblebee ♪
[Ms. Appleberry] ♪ Bumblebee starts with "B" ♪ [all] ♪ Alligator starts with "A" ♪
translation.it: Bumblebee ha la "B", alligator ha la "A"

translation.en: [all] ♪ "J" like a jellyfish Jiggle like a jellyfish ♪

translation.it: E il mio nome è Nico

translation.en: [both] ♪ Our names start With the letter "N" ♪
[Nina] ♪ Narwhals like to take a nap ♪
♪ And that's how you play The Animal Name game! ♪
translation.it: Abbiamo giocato coi nomi degli animali!
L'AVVENTURA COLORATA DI JJ E CODY

translation.en: Okay, kids. We need fruits that are red, blue and yellow.
translation.it: Ok, bambini. Ci servono frutti rossi, blu e gialli.

translation.en: [all] ♪ Find the red and blue And yellow fruits ♪
translation.it: Cerco i frutti rossi, blu e gialli

translation.en: ♪ What do we see at the grocery? ♪
translation.it: Che frutta c'è, qui intorno a me?

translation.en: ♪ Red, red! Which one is red? ♪
♪ Red, red. Which one is red? ♪
[all] ♪ Find the red and blue And yellow fruits ♪
translation.it: Cerco i frutti rossi, blu e gialli

translation.en: ♪ What do we see at the grocery? ♪
translation.it: Che frutta c'è, qui intorno a me?

translation.en: ♪ Look over there At all the round and colorful fruits ♪
translation.it: Guarda un po' qua! La frutta colorata lassù

translation.en: ♪ Blue, blue! Which one is blue? ♪
[Kwame and Cody] ♪ I found a blue fruit! ♪
♪ Blue, blue. Which one is blue? ♪
[Cody and JJ] ♪ Honk, honk! Blue, blue! ♪
♪ Find the red and blue And yellow fruits ♪
translation.it: Cerco i frutti rossi, blu e gialli

translation.en: ♪ What do we see at the grocery? ♪
translation.it: Che frutta c'è, qui intorno a me?

translation.en: [both] ♪ Yellow, yellow Reach for the yellow ♪
♪ I see yellow and so do you ♪
translation.it: Vedo il giallo! Lo vedi tu?
C'è il mango ed è lassù

translation.en: [all] ♪ We found the red And blue and yellow fruits ♪
translation.it: Ho i frutti rossi, blu e gialli

translation.en: ♪ And brought them home to eat ♪
Okay, class. Our bus will be here at twelve o'clock.
translation.it: Ok, bambini! Il pullman sarà qui alle 12:00.

translation.en: [Ms. Appleberry] ♪ One, two, three o'clock Four o'clock, rock ♪
translation.it: L'1:00, le 2:00, le 3:00, balla con me

translation.en: [all] ♪ Five, six, seven o'clock Eight o'clock, rock ♪
♪ Nine, ten, eleven o'clock Twelve o'clock, rock ♪
♪ We're gonna rock around The clock 'til night ♪
translation.it: Balliamo il rock Vediamo chi è il migliore

translation.en: [Ms. Appleberry] ♪ Put your glad rags on And join me, hon ♪
translation.it: Metti un bel vestito perché t'invito

translation.en: ♪ We'll have some fun When the clock strikes one ♪
translation.it: E l'uno sul sasso per il primo passo

translation.en: [all] ♪ We're gonna rock around The clock 'til night ♪
translation.it: Io ballerò il rock finché mi va

translation.en: ♪ We're gonna rock, rock, rock In broad daylight ♪
translation.it: Fin quando il sole non tramonterà

translation.en: ♪ We're gonna rock, gonna rock Around the clock 'til night ♪
translation.it: Noi balleremo il rock e il tempo volerà

translation.en: ♪ If the band slows down We'll yell for more ♪
translation.it: Ma con la band ho fatto un patto

translation.en: [Ms. Appleberry] ♪ We're gonna rock around The clock 'til night ♪
translation.it: Io ballerò il rock finché mi va

translation.it: Fin quando il sole non tramonterà

translation.en: ♪ We're gonna rock, gonna rock Around the clock 'til night ♪
translation.it: Noi balleremo il rock e il tempo volerà

translation.en: ♪ When the chimes ring five Six and seven ♪
♪ We'll be right in seventh heaven ♪
♪ We're gonna rock around The clock 'til night ♪
translation.it: Io ballerò il rock finché mi va

translation.en: ♪ We're gonna rock, rock Rock in broad daylight ♪
translation.it: Fin quando il sole non tramonterà

translation.en: ♪ We're gonna rock, gonna rock Around the clock 'til night ♪
translation.it: Noi balleremo il rock e il tempo volerà

translation.en: ♪ When it's eight, nine, ten, eleven too ♪
[Ms. Appleberry] ♪ I'll be going strong and so will you ♪
translation.it: Io andrò alla grande e anche voi

translation.it: Io ballerò il rock finché mi va

[Ms. Appleberry] ♪ Start a-rocking Around the clock again ♪
[all] ♪ We're gonna rock around The clock 'til night ♪
